title: Aurek-class tactical strikefighter
wikitext:
[[File:Aurek Starfighter.jpg|thumb|500px|right]] '''Aurek Starfighter'''
'''Craft''': Republic Fleet Systems Aurek Tactical Strikefighter
'''Type''': Tactical Strike starfighter
'''Scale''': starfighter
'''Length''': 9.2 meters long
'''Skill''': Starfighter Piloting

'''Consumables''': 1 week

Damage: 9D '''Notes''': The Aurek starfighter has a tapered body with wings that can be configured to different positions. Designed during the restoration between the Great Sith War and the Mandalorian Wars, the Aurek offers legendary performance levels, but at a proportionally high production cost. '''Source:''' KORSE p180-181. Converted from d20 Saga Edition rules.
